Office of the Commissioner of Police Cyberabad, Hyderabad
N O T I F I C A T I O N

It has been observed that a large number Cabs operating in Cyberabad jurisdiction are operating in an unsafe and haphazard manner without adequate documents and unlicensed drivers. It is also found that drivers of these contract carriages are misbehaving with passengers, charging undue fees and also indulging in aiding unlawful activities. Many of these vehicles are also affecting road safety and security by parking in dangerous places, driving rashly and creating other forms of nuisance. Therefore to ensure that such vehicles operate in an orderly manner and do not compromise public and road safety, in exercise of the powers conferred upon me under section 7 Clause (1) of Cyberabad City Police Act No. 2 of 2004 r/w Section 21 Clause (1) (b) of Hyderabad City Police Act 1348-F, I, Commissioner of Police, Cyberabad do here by notify for the information of general public that
I. All the drivers of above vehicles will have to be registered themselves with Cyberabad Traffic Police in the manner prescribed below. a. All the owners/drivers who are desirous of operating in the jurisdiction of Cyberabad Commissionerate will have to apply for registration of the drivers in the format given in Form CR 2 and CR 2 A of this notification along with valid documents given thereof. b. They will have to provide proof of identification and address as specified in Annexure – I. c. They will have to carry the QR coded card / display as issued and place it in a place visible to the passengers sitting in the rear seat at all times. d. This registration will be valid for a period of one year or validity of documents whichever is earliest. On expiry they have to apply for renewal. No charges will be charged for the permission. However a nominal fee for preparing the ID Card / Sticker / Name Card may be charged during registration / renewal if required as ordered by Commissioner of Police, Cyberabad. Hired vehicles which violate these rules will be liable for action under Cyberabad Police Act and relevant provision of the IPC and M.V. Act. The application process will be start from 01-03-2014. These rules come into force from 01-05-2014. Sd/-
The mandatory requirements for Registration / Renewal: For Drivers:
ii) Aadhar Card iii)Passport Size Photos iv) Proof of address - LPG Gas Bill (Recent) or - Passport or - Pan Card or - Bank Passbook.
